full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR GYIS CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI THU SHE YE GUNG KUN DGA' DON LDAN ZHES BGYI BA'I 'BANGS, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS DANG, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I CHED DU, ,BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL PA BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYI SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, DGE BSGOS BSAM GTAN RGYA MTSO'O, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
